conference_details.name: EICS 2026: The 18th ACM SIGCHI Symposium on Engineering Interactive Computing Systems

recommended_journals.name: Journal Proceedings of the ACM on Human-Computer Interaction (PACM - EICS series)

conference_aims.description: EICS 2026 is devoted to engineering interactive computing systems and their user interfaces, addressing one or more software quality factors, such as usability, user experience, reliability, security, etc.

eHealth_topics: Modelling, specification and analysis of interaction and interactive systems
Methods, processes, principles and/or tools for building interactive systems
Formal methods within interactive systems engineering
Bridging the gap between engineering and design practices
Computational techniques for designing and evaluating interactive systems
Explore and/or employ of diverse interaction techniques and devices
Engineering hardware or software integration in interactive systems
Engineering interactive systems for diverse user groups
Applying AI technologies in methods, processes and tools for building interactive systems

paper_format_submission.review_process: Traditional journal model of reviewing with options for recommendations or revisions.

publication.platform: Journal Proceedings of the ACM on Human-Computer Interaction (PACM - EICS series)
publication.journal_publication_conditions: Accepted papers may be either regular research papers or technical notes.

preparation.submission_format: Papers should comply with ACM policy.
